name: Still Life: an inanimate love story (prototype demo)
name_original: Still Life: an inanimate love story (prototype demo)
description:
Welcome to Still Life- the dating sim where the object of your affection is an actual inanimate object.

In this bare-bones prototype demo,  enter a club room that will more likely than not have no place in the full version, and have an entertaining conversation with Pencil, Sharpener, or Mobile Phone.

Background source: wallpapermaiden.com (Anime Room, Chairs, Desk, Sunlight, Window)

Music source:

Casual Loop #1 by Andrew Sitkov

Casual Loop #2 by Andrew Sitkov

Casual Loop #3 by Andrew Sitkov

Mystical Loop #1 by Andrew Sitkov

Rhythm of Life by Andy Ray
